languages.text: {n}Глаза заволакивает мрак, однако ощущение чужеродного присутствия не исчезает. Нечто примитивное и тупое в своем упорном стремлении копошится в ваших мыслях, перебирая и меняя их. Вы собираете остатки воли в кулак и отчаянно держитесь за ту часть сознания, что еще не попала под чужую власть. Укол удивления, вспышка разочарования... морок овладевает вашим ослабевшим сознанием, однако часть его все еще принадлежит вам — и готова сопротивляться. На границе восприятия начинает брезжить неверный свет...{/n}

{n}Darkness clouds your vision but the sensation of an alien presence does not relent. Something both primitive and stupid in its stubborn effort is rummaging through your mind, churning through thoughts and changing them. You gather whatever remains of your willpower and desperately hold on to the part of your consciousness that has not yet caved to the invading power. A prick of surprise, a burst of disappointment... The spell takes hold of your weakened self, but part of it still belongs to you and is ready to fight back. A stray light dawns at the edge of your perception...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Darkness clouds your eyes, but the sensation of an alien presence does not relent. Something both primitive and stupid in its stubborn effort is rummaging through your mind, turning thoughts over and changing them. You gather what remains of your willpower and desperately hold on to the part consciousness that has not yet fallen to the invading power. A prick of surprise, a burst of disappointment... The spell takes hold of your weakened self, but a part of it still belongs to you and is ready to fight back. A stray light dawns at the edge of your perception...{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vos yeux ne peuvent voir dans l'obscurité, mais la sensation d'une présence étrangère ne faiblit pas. Une créature primitive et inepte s'efforce de fouiller votre esprit à la recherche de pensées à modifier. Vous rassemblez ce qu'il vous reste de volonté et vous accrochez désespérément à la partie de votre esprit qui n'a pas encore succombé à cette présence délétère. Une pointe de surprise, un accès de déception... Le sortilège s'empare de votre conscience affaiblie, mais une partie de celle-ci vous appartient encore, prête à riposter. Une lumière diffuse se lève aux limites de votre perception...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Darkness clouds your vision but the sensation of an alien presence does not relent. Something both primitive and stupid in its stubborn effort is rummaging through your mind, churning through thoughts and changing them. You gather whatever remains of your willpower and desperately hold on to the part of your consciousness that has not yet caved to the invading power. A prick of surprise, a burst of disappointment... Une lumière diffuse se lève aux limites de votre perception...{/n}

languages.text: {n}你的眼前一片黑暗，但外来实体的存在感并没有减弱。某种既原始、又愚蠢的东西在你的脑海中固执地翻找着，搅乱你的意识，篡改你的思想。你凝聚起你残余的意志力，拼命抓住尚未屈服于这种力量的部分意识。随后，你的脑中传来了惊讶于失望的浪潮……外物的力量束缚住了你较弱的那部分意识，但你的一部分意识依然属于你自己，做好了反击的准备。随后，一束散乱的明光浮现在你感知的边缘……{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Darkness clouds your vision but the sensation of an alien presence does not relent. Something both primitive and stupid in its stubborn effort is rummaging through your mind, churning through thoughts and changing them. You gather whatever remains of your willpower and desperately hold on to the part of your consciousness that has not yet caved to the invading power. A prick of surprise, a burst of disappointment... The spell takes hold of your weakened self, but part of it still belongs to you and is ready to fight back. A stray light dawns at the edge of your perception...{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたの視界は闇に覆われたが、異質な存在の感覚は消えなかった。何か原始的で愚鈍な存在が、あなたの心と思考をしつこくかき乱し、変えていく。その侵入してくる力に対し、あなたは意志の力を振り絞り、まだ屈していない意識の部分に必死にしがみついた。虚を突かれた驚き、高まる失望感…。弱った自分を呪文が支配しようとするが、まだ一部の自我は保たれており、抵抗する準備もできている。あなたの知覚の境界で、迷光が差し込み始めた…。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Darkness clouds your vision but the sensation of an alien presence does not relent. Something both primitive and stupid in its stubborn effort is rummaging through your mind, churning through thoughts and changing them. You gather whatever remains of your willpower and desperately hold on to the part of your consciousness that has not yet caved to the invading power. A prick of surprise, a burst of disappointment... The spell takes hold of your weakened self, but part of it still belongs to you and is ready to fight back. A stray light dawns at the edge of your perception...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたの視界は闇に覆われたが、異質な存在の感覚は消えなかった。何か原始的で愚鈍な存在が、あなたの心と思考をしつこくかき乱し、変えていく。その侵入してくる力に対し、あなたは意志の力を振り絞り、まだ屈していない意識の部分に必死にしがみついた。虚を突かれた驚き、高まる失望感…。弱った自分を呪文が支配しようとするが、まだ一部の自我は保たれており、抵抗する準備もできている。あなたの知覚の境界で、迷光が差し込み始めた…。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Deine Sicht wird von Dunkelheit getrübt, doch die fremde Präsenz gibt nicht nach. Etwas ebenso Primitives wie Dummes wühlt sich hartnäckig durch deinen Geist, schüttelt deine Gedanken durch und verändert sie. Du nimmst alles zusammen, was von deiner Willenskraft noch geblieben ist, und klammerst dich verzweifelt an dem Teil deines Bewusstseins fest, der noch nicht vor der eindringenden Larve kapituliert hat. Du erfährst verschiedene Schübe der Überraschung und Enttäuschung ... Dein Bewusstsein ist geschwächt und steht unter einem Bann, aber ein letzter Teil bleibt weiter bei dir und ist bereit, sich zu wehren. Ein umherirrendes Licht dämmert am Rande deines Bewusstseins ...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Darkness clouds your vision but the sensation of an alien presence does not relent. Something both primitive and stupid in its stubborn effort is rummaging through your mind, churning through thoughts and changing them. You gather whatever remains of your willpower and desperately hold on to the part of your consciousness that has not yet caved to the invading power. A prick of surprise, a burst of disappointment... The spell takes hold of your weakened self, but part of it still belongs to you and is ready to fight back. A stray light dawns at the edge of your perception...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Deine Augen werden von Dunkelheit getrübt, aber die fremde Präsenz gibt nicht nach. Etwas sowohl Primitives als auch Dummes wühlt sich hartnäckig durch deinen Geist, schüttelt deine Gedanken durch und verändert sie. Du nimmst alles zusammen, was von deiner Willenskraft noch geblieben ist, und klammerst dich verzweifelt an dem Teil deines Bewusstseins fest, der noch nicht vor der eindringenden Larve kapituliert hat. Du erfährst verschiedene Schübe der Überraschung und Enttäuschung ... Dein Bewusstsein ist geschwächt und steht unter einem Bann, aber ein letzter Teil bleibt weiter bei dir und ist bereit, sich zu wehren. Ein umherirrendes Licht dämmert am Rande deines Bewusstseins ...{/n}

languages.text: {n}La oscuridad nubla tu visión, pero la sensación de una presencia ajena a tu propia consciencia no te abandona. Hay algo primitivo y a la vez estúpido en su obstinado esfuerzo por hurgar en tu mente, revolviendo en tus pensamientos y alterándolos. Haces acopio de la poca fuerza de voluntad que te queda y te aferras desesperadamente a esa parte de tu consciencia que aún no ha cedido a la intrusión. Una punzada de sorpresa, un estallido de decepción... El conjuro se apodera de tu debilitada psique, pero en el fondo aún te pertenece y está lista para luchar. Entonces un rayo de luz asoma en los límites de tu percepción...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Darkness clouds your vision but the sensation of an alien presence does not relent. Something both primitive and stupid in its stubborn effort is rummaging through your mind, churning through thoughts and changing them. You gather whatever remains of your willpower and desperately hold on to the part of your consciousness that has not yet caved to the invading power. A prick of surprise, a burst of disappointment... The spell takes hold of your weakened self, but part of it still belongs to you and is ready to fight back. A stray light dawns at the edge of your perception...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La oscuridad te nubla los ojos, pero la sensación de una presencia ajena a tu propia consciencia no te abandona. Hay algo primitivo y a la vez estúpido en su obstinado esfuerzo por hurgar en tu mente, revolviendo en tus pensamientos y alterándolos. Haces acopio de la poca fuerza de voluntad que te queda y te aferras desesperadamente a esa parte de tu consciencia que aún no ha cedido a la intrusión. Una punzada de sorpresa, un estallido de decepción... El conjuro se apodera de tu debilitada psique, pero en el fondo aún te pertenece y está lista para luchar. Entonces un rayo de luz asoma en los límites de tu percepción...{/n}

languages.text: {n}Gözlerine karanlık bir perde iniyor ancak yabancı varlığın hissiyatını sezinlemeye devam ediyorsun. Zihnini karıştırma konusundaki katır gibi inatçı olan bu şey, düşüncelerini çalkalayıp onları değiştiriyor. Kalan az miktarda iradeni topluyor ve bilincinin bu istilacı güce karşı henüz yenik düşmemiş kısmına umutsuzca tutunmaya çalışıyorsun. Bir sürpriz sızıntısı, bir hayal kırıklığı patlaması... Büyü, zayıflamış benliğini ele geçiriyor. Gelgelelim bu benliğin bir kısmı hâlâ sana ait ve karşı saldırıya geçmeye hazır. Algının kayboluş noktasında başıboş bir ışık doğuyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Darkness clouds your vision but the sensation of an alien presence does not relent. Something both primitive and stupid in its stubborn effort is rummaging through your mind, churning through thoughts and changing them. You gather whatever remains of your willpower and desperately hold on to the part of your consciousness that has not yet caved to the invading power. A prick of surprise, a burst of disappointment... The spell takes hold of your weakened self, but part of it still belongs to you and is ready to fight back. A stray light dawns at the edge of your perception...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Gözlerine karanlık bir perde iniyor ancak yabancı varlığın yarattığı hissiyat kaybolmuyor. Zihnini karıştırma konusundaki çabasında aptal derecede inatçı olan bu şey, düşüncelerini çalkalıyor ve onları değiştiriyor. Kalan az miktarda iradeni topluyorsun ve bilincinin bu istilacı güce karşı henüz yenik düşmemiş kısmına umutsuzca tutunmaya çalışıyorsun. Bir sürpriz sızıntısı, bir hayal kırıklığı patlaması... Büyü zayıflamış benliğini ele geçiriyor ancak bu benliğin bir kısmı hâlâ sana ait ve karşı saldırıya geçmeye hazır. Algının köşelerinde başıboş bir ışık doğuyor.{/n}
